name: New Atlantis
description: New Atlantis is the capital city of the United Colonies, located on the planet Jemison, in the Alpha Centauri System.

name: New Atlantis Spaceport
description: The New Atlantis Spaceport is where you first arrive when travelling to New Atlantis. A few conveniently located services can be found past the UC Security checkpoint, including The Viewport, Jemison Mercantile, and TerraBrew Coffee. The New Atlantis Transit (NAT) can take you to other districts and an elevator, tucked away between Jemison Mercantile and TerraBrew, can carry you down to The Well.

name: Commercial District
description: The Commercial District is one of three major districts within New Atlantis. Home to several New Atlantis businesses, including UC Distribution, SSNN, Infinity LTD, TerraBrew Coffee, and Valberg. You can fast travel to this location using the Commercial District or New Atlantis West End fast travel markers.

name: MAST District
description: The MAST District (also known as the Embassy District) is one of three major districts within New Atlantis, home to the MAST. The most notable buildings in the district are the MAST tower, Freestar Collective embassy and the abandoned Va'ruun embassy. The Lodge is also in this district.

name: Residential District
description: The Residential District is one of three major districts within New Atlantis. Features a number of high density high-rises and a number of shops and services.

name: The Lodge
description: The Lodge is Constellation's headquarters in MAST district of New Atlantis.

name: The Well
description: The Well is the underbelly of New Atlantis, housing the city's poorer residents.

name: Akila City
description: It was founded in 2167 by Solomon Coe. The diverse people of Akila City are united in their beliefs of personal freedom. The city itself is walled in, due to the hostile alien life present on the planet. In particular the walls defend the population against the predatory Ashta, which is described as a "cross between a wolf and a velociraptor". [1]

name: The Core
description: The Core is the oldest and most prestigious district in Akila City.

name: Midtown
description: Midtown is the commercial district of Akila City.

name: The Rock
description: The Rock is a large building in the center of Akila City, hosting services and the Freestar Rangers' headquarters. The building is owned by the City.

name: The Stretch
description: The Stretch is the poorest district of Akila City.

name: Cydonia
description: Cydonia is the largest mining operation in the United Colonies. The resources mined here are used to supply Deimos Staryard.

name: Mars Launchpad
description: The Mars Launchpad is an old NASA launch site near Cydonia.

name: Freighter Site
description: The Freighter Site is an abandoned ship landed on Mars, near Cydonia.

name: Deep Mines Employee Exit
description: Deep Mines Employee Exit is an access to the Deep Mines. This appears to be connected to an elevator within the Deep Mines that is not usable. As a result, this location can not be easily found.

name: TMD Headquarters
description: The Red Devils HQ is an abandoned military base on Mars, near Cydonia. Name changes from Red Devils HQ to TMD Headquarters after completion of UC quest line. It is located deep underground, and is connected to both a landing pad on the Martian surface via an elevator, and to the Deep Mines by a large cavern. Before it was abandoned, it served as the headquarters of the Red Devils.

name: Neon
description: This article is about the city. For the resource, see Neon (Resource).

name: Bayu Plaza
description: Bayu Plaza is a section of Neon's busy city core containing a number of shops and the Trade Tower.

name: Ikuchi Market
description: Ikuchi Market is a section of Neon's busy city core containing a number of shops and Ryujin Tower.
planet: Volii Alpha, in the Volii System

name: Trade Tower
description: Trade Tower is a building that houses a number of corporate offices on Neon. The Astral Lounge occupies the ground floor.

name: Ryujin Tower
description: Ryujin Tower is a building containing various Ryujin corporate shops and offices.

name: Ebbside
description: Ebbside is a lower level of Neon containing less fortunate residents along with a few shops and services.
planet: Volii Alpha, in the Volii System

name: Underbelly
description: Underbelly is the lowest level of Neon.
planet: Volii Alpha, in the Volii System

name: Gagarin Landing
description: Gagarin Landing is a former industrial town on the planet Gagarin, in the Alpha Centauri System. It was originally a hub for both mining and construction, in particular the construction of Mechs. After the end of the Colony War, Mechs were banned, resulting in the shutdown of most of Gagarin's industry and the collapse of its economy. In recent years, the economy has gained new life thanks to heavy investment by New Atlantis's corporate elite, leading to conflict over gentrification.

name: HopeTown
description: In addition to a large HopeTech shipyard, this settlement is home to The Pit Stop, a bar, Best Defense, a weapons store, and a Freestar Rangers office.

name: New Homestead
description: New Homestead (originally Titan Astrobase) is an early colony originally founded by NASA on Titan, Sol System. It is located in the territory of the United Colonies, the largest military and political power in the Settled Systems. The city itself is mostly underground, though it began on the surface.

name: Paradiso
description: To edit this section: Paradiso People

name: Crucible
description: Crucible is a secret settlement on Charybdis III, Charybdis System.

name: Eren's Camp
description: Eren's Camp is Eren Bascolm's former hiding spot on Hyla II. The base consists of a three-floor home; next to it is a hangar with industrial facilities and a watchtower.

name: Vlad's Villa
description: Please add a description for Vlad's Villa.

name: The Eleos Retreat
description: The Eleos Retreat is a settlement on Ixyll II that is under construction as a rehabilitation center for convicts.

name: Pilgrim's Rest
description: Pilgrim's Rest is the former camp of the pilgrim.

name: Waggoner Farm
description: Waggoner Farm is a farm on Montara Luna, Cheyenne System. It is inhabited by Mikaela Waggoner and her father, Waylon Waggoner.

name: Deserted Trade Authority Starstation
description: Deserted Trade Authority Starstation is a trade authority starstation that has been overrun by Spacers

name: Eklund Excavation Site CL25
description: Eklund Excavation Site CL25 is an abandoned asteroid mining facility around Bonner, Sakharov System. The facility is mostly deserted, but some robots are still operational. Maya Cruz hid here after escaping The Clinic during Surgical Strike.

name: Etherea Ruins
description: Etherea Ruins is a ruined starstation located in the Wolf System.

name: The Almagest
description: The Almagest is a starstation in orbit around Nesoi. The station is an abandoned zero-G casino, currently occupied by spacers.

name: The Clinic
description: The Clinic is a state-of-the art medical facility aboard a starstation. It is headed by Dr. Lara Darvish.

name: The Den
description: The Den is a starstation located in the Wolf System.

name: The Eye
description: The Eye is a starstation owned by Constellation and maintained by Vladimir Sall. The Eye serves as a deep space scanner.

name: The Sonder
description: The Sonder is a starstation located in the Bessel System, orbiting Bessel II.

name: Starstation RE-939
description: Starstation RE-939 is an explorable starstation located in the Alpha Centauri System.

name: Starstation UCN-48
description: Starstation UCN-48 is an abandoned Serpent's Crusade era starstation coopted as a covert base of operations by Va'ruun agents.

name: SY-920
description: SY-920 is a classified UC research station in orbit around Luyten's Rock.

name: Deimos Staryard
description: Deimos Staryard is a major United Colonies staryard near Deimos. It is operated by the spaceship manufacturer Deimos Staryards Inc.

name: Stroud-Eklund Staryard
description: Stroud-Eklund Staryard is a Staryard operated by Stroud-Eklund that orbits the moon Dalvik in the Narion System. You must dock and speak to Havershaw to purchase ship parts.

name: Trident Luxury Lines Staryard
description: Trident Luxury Lines Staryard is a Staryard orbiting Akila, specializing in luxury ships.

name: Nova Galactic Staryard
description: Nova Galactic Staryard is a staryard near Earth's Moon. It is no longer operating and spacers have taken up residence.

name: Autonomous Staryard
description: Autonomous Staryard is an abandoned staryard orbiting Volii Psi in the Volii System. It is no longer operating and the robots have taken over.

name: Deimos Armored Transport
description: Deimos Armored Transport is an abandoned transport ship with a malfunctioning grav drive and can be filled with either Spacers or the Crimson Fleet.

name: ECS Constant
description: The ECS Constant is a generation ship that has been traveling in isolation for 200 years. After entering the Porrima System, a mysterious ship can be seen orbiting Porrima II. Attempting to hail the ship only results in hearing distorted screeching noises. It's also possible to receive a distress call from Jiro Sugiyama requesting you to speak with him on Paradiso regarding the ship. Either docking and boarding the ship or speaking with Jiro will begin the mission "First Contact".

name: GalBank Legacy
description: GalBank Legacy is an abandoned GalBank transport vessel in orbit around Bannoc IV.

name: Siren of the Stars
description: Siren of the Stars is a luxury space vessel owned and operated by Trident Luxury Lines.

name: Deimos Armored Transport
description: Deimos Armored Transport is an abandoned transport ship with a malfunctioning grav drive and can be filled with either Spacers or the Crimson Fleet.

name: GalBank Legacy
description: GalBank Legacy is an abandoned GalBank transport vessel in orbit around Bannoc IV.

name: The Colander
description: The Colander is an abandoned research ship harboring an unwelcome guest.

name: Apollo Landing Site
description: The Apollo Landing Site is a historical site marking the spot where humans first set foot on a planetary body other than Earth.

name: Cairo Landmark
description: The Cairo Landmark is a historical site marking a pyramid near where Cairo once was.

name: Dubai Landmark
description: The Dubai Landmark is a historical site marking ruined remains of the Burj Khalifa.

name: Hong Kong Landmark
description: The Hong Kong Landmark is a historical site marking the remains of the International Commerce Centre, once a skyscraper in a city known as Hong Kong.

name: London Landmark
description: The London Landmark is a historical site marking what's left of the Shard, formerly a skyscraper in Southwark, London.

name: Los Angeles Landmark
description: The Los Angeles Landmark is a historical site marking the structure that once was the US Bank Tower in the area formerly known as Los Angeles, California.

name: NASA Launch Tower
description: The NASA Launch Tower is an abandoned NASA facility on Earth. It is located at Cape Canaveral.

name: New York Landmark
description: The New York Landmark is a historical site marking the location of the Empire State Building on the Earth-That-Was.

name: Opportunity Rover
description: The Opportunity Rover is a historical site marking the last known location of one of NASA's robotic explorers.

name: Osaka Landmark
description: The Osaka Landmark is a historical site marking remains of the Abeno Harukas, once the tallest skyscraper in the old earth country of Japan.

name: Pisa Landmark
description: The Pisa Landmark is an unmarked, historical site where the remains of the Leaning Tower of Pisa are located.

name: Shanghai Landmark
description: The Shanghai Landmark is a historical site marking the remains of the Shanghai Tower, once the tallest building in China.

name: St. Louis Landmark
description: The St. Louis Landmark is a historical site marking the still standing Gateway Arch in a region formerly known as St. Louis, Missouri.

name: Face of Mars Landmark
description: Face of Mars Landmark is an unmarked natural landmark on Mars

name: 1-Of-A-Kind Salvage
description: 1-Of-A-Kind Salvage is an abandoned Freestar Militia military base converted into a salvage yard. It is located on Niira, the site of the fiercest battle of the Colony War, and overlooks a large battlefield to the north. Acid rain, feral xenoweapons, and Ecliptic mercenaries make salvage operations a dangerous but lucrative prospect. The name is an inside joke on the facts that they are the only place in the area and that most of the mechs they are harvesting come from a group known as The First Cavalry.

name: Freestar Mech Factory
description: Please add a description for Freestar Mech Factory.

name: Lair of the Mantis
description: Lair of the Mantis is the Mantis's headquarters.
planet: Denebola I-b, in the Denebola System

name: Tau Gourmet Production Center
description: Tau Gourmet Production Center is is a defunct meat processing facility on Tau Ceti II.

name: Research Camp
description: The Research Camp is a small Freestar Collective outpost on Altair II.

name: Safe House Gamma
description: Please add a description for Safe House Gamma.

name: Buried Temple
description: Please add a description for Buried Temple.

name: Forward Base 441
description: Forward Base 441 is a military base overlooking the ruins of Londinion.

name: Mars Mech Factory
description: Mars Mech Factory is a Point of Interest (POI) on Mars, in the Sol System.

name: The Lock
description: The Lock is a former United Colonies prison, now in ruins.

name: Victor Compound
description: Please add a description for Victor Compound.

name: Argos Extractors Mining Outpost
description: Argos Extractors Mining Outpost is a Mining Base operated by Argos Extractors on Vectera, Narion System. The player starts the game working in this mine with Supervisor Lin and Heller.

name: Bindi Mining Outpost
description: Bindi Mining Outpost is a defunct mining outpost on Akila's moon Bindi, now operated by Crimson Fleet.

name: CM Station RC-1
description: CM Station RC-1 is an abandoned mining outpost of Consolidated Mining.

name: Eklund Excavation Site CL25
description: Eklund Excavation Site CL25 is an abandoned asteroid mining facility around Bonner, Sakharov System. The facility is mostly deserted, but some robots are still operational. Maya Cruz hid here after escaping The Clinic during Surgical Strike.

name: Hephaestus Mine H-363
description: Please add a description for Hephaestus Mine H-363.

name: Ka'zaal Sulfur Mine
description: Please add a description for Ka'zaal Sulfur Mine.

name: The Empty Nest
description: The Empty Nest is a camp held by the Shaw Gang near Akila City

name: Vulture's Roost
description: Please add a description for Vulture's Roost.

name: Dauntless Crew's Crash Site
description: Please add a description for Dauntless Crew's Crash Site.

name: ECS Constant Shuttle Crash Site
description: ECS Constant Shuttle Crash Site is a crashed shuttle from the ECS Constant.

name: Sarah Morgan's Crash Site
description: Please add a description for Sarah Morgan's Crash Site.

name: Kreet Research Lab
description: The Kreet Research Lab is an abandoned United Colonies Xenowarfare lab on Kreet. Originally constructed just prior to the Colony War in order to perform research on Kreet Stalkers, the lab was eventually made part of the Terrormorph research project. The project ended in disaster when a Terrormorph escaped containment and slaughtered the laboratory staff.

name: Meteorite Testing Site
description: Please add a description for Meteorite Testing Site.

name: NeuraDyne Botany Laboratory
description: NeuraDyne Botany Laboratory is a science lab located on Beta Marae I. It has been taken over by Ecliptic mercenaries.

name: Nishina Research Station
description: The Nishina Research Station is a research station on Freya III, Freya System.

name: Nova Galactic Research Station
description: The Nova Galactic Research Station is an abandoned research station on Luna, Sol System. The research station contains a supercomputer, named "Voltaire", and was used by Nova Galactic to research faster-than-light travel.

name: Reclaimed Outpost
description: Please add a description for Reclaimed Outpost.

name: Reliant Medical Organics Lab
description: Reliant Medical Organics Lab is a Reliant Medical facility. The Facility houses Project Sumeria,"the Settled Systems largest and most pertinent backup of medicinal plants". The goal of Project Sumeria is to, "protect and maintain the well-being of thousands of years of studies in botany and medicine". The facility was staffed with only one person; whose job was to grow and care for the plants, maintain the robots in the facility, and maintain the water filtration system.

name: Research Outpost U3-09
description: Research Outpost U3-09 is a Freestar Collective research lab on Altair II.

name: Sonny Di Falco's Island
description: Sonny Di Falco's Island is a luxurious estate located on Maheo I

name: Valerie's Cache
description: Please add a description for Valerie's Cache.
